io.requery.query

Interface LogicalCondition<L,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    L - left operand type
    R - right operand type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AndOr<LogicalCondition<?,?>>, Condition<L,R>

    public interface LogicalCondition<L,R>
extends Condition<L,R>, AndOr<LogicalCondition<?,?>>
    Condition which can be further chained with an and/or with another operation.
